citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00PM on
30-Aug-17.
APHIS inspector arrived at the facility at 3:00PM on Wednesday, August 30, 2017 and called the phone number
provided by the facility. APHIS inspector left a voice message. The inspector found a woman on the property who
informed the inspector that there was no one available to accompany APHIS personnel on an inspection, as the
licensee was not present.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00PM on
30-Aug-17.
APHIS inspector arrived at the facility at 3:00PM on Wednesday, August 30, 2017 and called the phone number
provided by the facility. APHIS inspector left a voice message. The inspector found a woman on the property who
informed the inspector that there was no one available to accompany APHIS personnel on an inspection, as the
licensee was not present.
